title: shopart
author: shopart
content: I have a domain name I have owned for over 10 years just when Crypto started to become noticed, and I think today it would be a fantastic investment for the right person that has an interest in Bitcoin and its community Members!There are many options, opportunities to use this domain name for, just one being recruiting Bitcoin Members interested in this fast growing lucrative topic called Bitcoin!To date, I have built a basic WordPress website, but it could be used for many other projects as a similar forum to this one Bitcoin Talk. I see this forum has hundreds if not thousands of subscribers interested in Bitcoin, so by just using this as an example you should be able to see the potential!I may also be interested in working with someone on a project but would be looking for a initial investment, however my main goal would be to sell it outright.I also have many social media platforms that are registered with the same name as the domain that is Bitcoin Members that I would also be willing to sell as part of a package deal listed all below;Domain Name: www.bitcoinmembers.comTwitter Account 1: https://twitter.com/BitcoinMembersBitcoin Gold Members@bitcoinmembers Twitter Account 2: https://twitter.com/MembersBitcoinBitcoin Members@MembersBitcoinFacebook Pagehttps://www.facebook.com/BitcoinCommunityMembersPinteresthttps://www.pinterest.co.uk/bitcoingold/If you have some interest I would be interested in hearing from you?Thanks in advance!

comments.author: shopart
comments.body: I was hoping to sell this domain name so if interested please lets start the action as it would be good to see someone interested as it is quite unique?

comments.author: shopart
comments.body: Anyone interested in a unique big buck money making opportunity that wont be available for long as going to promote it on several other networks?!
